select.value: select p.pro_sta_awards,p.pro_id,p.pro_name,p.pro_date_sub,p.pro_awards,c.con_name,c.con_no,d.dep_name from t_projectinfo p left join t_contestinfo c on p.pro_con_num = c.con_no left join t_departmentinfo d on c.con_auspices = d.dep_id where {#condition#} and p.pro_sta_awards!="待认定" and p.pro_sta_awards!="院系待认定" and p.pro_sta_awards!="院系审核不通过" and p.pro_sta_awards!="校团委审核通过" and p.pro_date_sub!="" union select p.pro_sta_awards,p.pro_id,p.pro_name,p.pro_date_sub,p.pro_awards,c.con_name,c.con_no,d.dep_name from t_projectinfo p left join t_contestinfo c on p.pro_con_num = c.con_no left join t_departmentinfo d on c.con_auspices = d.dep_id where {#condition#} and p.pro_sta_awards="院系待认定" and d.dep_name like '%共青团哈尔滨工程大学委员会%' and p.pro_date_sub!=""

select d.dep_name,c.con_no,p.pro_id,p.pro_name,p.pro_date_sub,p.pro_awards,p.pro_remark,p.pro_sta_awards,c.con_name from t_projectinfo p left join t_contestinfo c on p.pro_con_num = c.con_no left join t_departmentinfo d on c.con_auspices = d.dep_id where {#condition#} and p.pro_sta_awards="校团委审核通过" and p.pro_date_sub!=""
